CheckTitle: Ensure cognito user pools should have a password policy that meets or exceed AWS CIS Foundations Benchmark standards length 14, 1 number, 1 special character, 1 upper 1 lower
Description: Cognito user pools should have a restrictive password policy that meets or exceeds the AWS CIS Foundations Benchmark standards. This includes a minimum password length of 14 characters, at least one number, one special character, one uppercase letter, and one lowercase letter.
Risk: Password policies that are too lenient can make it easier for attackers to guess or brute force user passwords. This can lead to unauthorized access to user accounts and sensitive data.

Recommendation.Text: Setting a strong password policy for your Cognito user pools can help protect your users' accounts and sensitive data.
